Sona's kit has a large degree of consistency inherent in it. It's both easy to play but has room to learn and grow. It has some very easy to under-rate aspects like the area speed boost which can lead to either some mitigated losses or better clean up in team fights. She also has some pretty high base burst with passive+q which can lead to a kill on a low healthy enemy thinking they can kill the weak support post fight. Then there is her ult which guarantees that so long as she lands _one_ good team fight ult her team could turn around a losing game.

Sure she's gone through all sorts of balance/meta ups and downs. However, her kit has always had some degree of that consistency. That means, gameplay wise, better feeling games cause there's always some hope. (until she's dead cause she's squishy as heck).

Take those gameplay moments. Match them with a cute visage and vocaloid style. You get Sona.
